meanings.definition: In a clever or cunning manner.
meanings.sent1: She shrewdly outsmarted the tricky puzzle.
meanings.sent2: He shrewdly negotiated a better deal for himself.
meanings.sent3: The cat shrewdly waited for the mouse to come out of its hole.
meanings.sent4: The detective shrewdly uncovered the criminal's hidden motive.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel shrewdly hid its acorns for the winter.

meanings.definition: Showing sharp powers of judgment; astute.
meanings.sent1: The shrewdly businessman made profitable investments.
meanings.sent2: She gave a shrewdly analysis of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The shrewdly fox always found a way to get the food first.
meanings.sent4: His shrewdly observations helped him excel in his career.
meanings.sent5: The shrewdly student always knew the right answer.
